backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing access control, user profiles, initialization flags, and Stripe config with storage mixin integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two logo‑update features to affected frontend files and component versions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short summaries for key frontend source files across components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/dist/.ic-assets.json5: IC asset configuration defining caching, MIME rules, SPA fallback, and security policy settings for the built frontend.
frontend/dist/index.html: Production-built HTML entry with full SEO metadata, structured data, social tags, and PWA configuration.
frontend/index.html: Development HTML entry containing SEO metadata, social tags, PWA settings, and root mounting for the React app.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Lists allowed Internet Computer domains for canister verification.
frontend/public/generated/.gitkeep: Placeholder file to keep the generated directory in version control.
frontend/public/generated/GENERATION_GUI: Detailed specifications and style rules for generating 57 PNG assets including branding, logos, and setup guides.
frontend/public/generated/STYLE-GUIDE.tx: Defines the visual style system including colors, typography, UI elements, and consistency rules for all assets.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest configuring app metadata, icons, shortcuts, and display behavior for EcoPowerHub AI.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing most crawling while blocking specific app paths and providing sitemap and crawl-delay settings.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing cache management with network-first navigation and cache-first asset strategies.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing main site pages with metadata such as priority, change frequency, and alternate languages.
frontend/restore-assets.js: Node script verifying required PNG assets exist and creating the generated directory if missing.
frontend/scripts/resend-ecopowerhub-logo: Script that outputs a specified Base64 slice of the monochrome logo PNG for reconstruction.
Reads a monochrome PNG, Base64‑encodes it, and outputs one of four slices based on a CLI argument.
Reads the full‑color logo PNG, Base64‑encodes it, and prints the requested quarter‑slice to stdout.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the main React app with routing, layout, authentication checks, and page components using TanStack Router and React Query.
frontend/src/components/affiliate/SolarG: Renders an affiliate section showcasing solar generator brands with details, benefits, images, and promo links.
frontend/src/components/affiliate/Tracki: Renders a tracking ID with a button to copy it to the clipboard, showing success or error feedback.
frontend/src/components/AlarmNotificatio: Displays a modal morning‑update alarm with weather, energy data, sound playback, and speech output.
frontend/src/components/AraChat.tsx: Implements a floating support chat widget that logs user messages and auto‑generates random assistant replies.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/AddAla: Provides a form dialog to create a new alarm, building a timestamp and submitting it via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/AddSys: Displays a form to add a new system configuration with region auto-detection and validation before submitting.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Alarms: Lists alarms with controls to add, edit, toggle, or delete them, using dialog components and query hooks.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Analyt: Shows energy analytics with charts, simulated predictions, report downloading, and deployment URL copy functionality.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/EditAl: A dialog component that loads an alarm's settings, allows editing fields like time and ringtone, and submits updates through a mutation.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Energy: Transforms energy data into chart-friendly format and renders a dual-axis line chart for consumption and temperature.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/EVAuth: Implements a dialog for connecting an EV provider via a mock OAuth flow and saving the resulting config.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Mainte: Displays a mock maintenance dashboard with system health, events, learning updates, and config, using placeholder data.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/MyEVCa: Shows EV telemetry and status with controls for solar charging and disconnecting, including a fallback when telemetry is missing.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Overvi: Fetches system and energy data to display stats, charts, and status cards, with loading states and a first‑system onboarding message.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Recomm: Fetches and filters AI recommendations by user language and displays them with loading placeholders and summary insights.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/System: Displays connected systems, EV integrations, and dialogs for adding systems and managing EV authentication.
Renders status cards for each system, showing latest energy and temperature data or a placeholder if no systems exist.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Temper: Visualizes temperature data in a bar chart with Celsius/Fahrenheit conversion.
frontend/src/components/diagnostics/Smar: Shows a mock smart diagnostics dashboard with placeholder diagnostic events and descriptive info.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with attribution links and branding.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with logo, user info, theme toggle, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/LoadingErrorBoun: Handles loading, timeout, and error states with retry logic and network detection, showing alerts or children accordingly.
Renders a marketing site footer with brand info, navigation links, social icons, and legal links.
Provides a responsive marketing header with theme toggle, region/language selectors, and navigation links.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Displays a modal for collecting a user's name and language, saving the profile, and showing feedback via toasts.
frontend/src/components/StableImage.tsx: Image component that prevents flicker and handles loading and error states with placeholders and fallbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, system configs, EV auth, and other mock backend data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for theming, dark mode, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/alarmService.ts: Provides functions for generating motivational messages, formatting alarm times, creating voice prompts, playing alarm sounds, and speaking morning updates.
frontend/src/lib/assetRestoration.ts: Defines metadata for 58 required PNG assets and documents their expected filenames, dimensions, categories, and usage.
frontend/src/lib/assetVerification.ts: Lists required generated assets grouped by category and includes types and logic references for runtime HTTP-based verification.
frontend/src/lib/generatedAssetPaths.ts: Exports centralized path constants for all generated PNG assets used across the app.
frontend/src/lib/i18n.ts: Provides supported languages, regions, device brands, system types, RTL detection, temperature utilities, and regional helpers.
frontend/src/lib/weather.ts: Implements Open-Meteo API fetching, weather code translation, forecast generation, and user geolocation retrieval.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/BestPracticesPage.tsx: Renders a best practices guide with sections on maintenance schedules and expandable checklists using cards and accordions.
frontend/src/pages/ComplianceSecurityPag: Displays compliance and security info with print-optimized styling and a PDF download workflow.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main dashboard with user greeting, admin controls, and tab-based navigation for system views.
Checks accessibility of production domains, shows deployment readiness alerts, and provides copyable domain info.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceIntegrationGuid: Lists detailed device integration guides with setup steps, troubleshooting, and images for supported hardware.
frontend/src/pages/DiagnosticsPage.tsx: Diagnostics UI showing regional electrical standards, searchable documentation, and a smart diagnostics panel.
frontend/src/pages/DomainPortfolioPage.t: Displays mock domain portfolio data, availability, cost totals, and brand strategy guidance.
frontend/src/pages/EmailAutomationPage.t: Defines email automation rules and a UI for toggling automated responses with preset replies.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with a hero section, CTA, and device setup guide previews.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen integrating Internet Identity with feature highlights and redirect on successful auth.
frontend/src/pages/MarketingCampaignAsse: Page displaying marketing assets including an ad script, banner variants, and clipboard copy functionality.
frontend/src/pages/PartnerMarketplacePag: Marketplace page listing affiliate programs with details like commission, benefits, and links.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Static privacy policy page outlining data collection, usage, and security practices.
frontend/src/pages/SupportIntegrationsPa: Page fetching and displaying manufacturer support and support boundaries with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/TechSpecsPage.tsx: Page presenting voltage compatibility, device specs, compliance standards, and SCADA protocol support.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Collection of TypeScript interfaces defining system configs, energy data, recommendations, pricing, SCADA support, and related domain models.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and retrieving persisted values, plus utilities for manipulating hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/vite-build-verify.js: Node script that verifies required image assets exist in the Vite build output with correct filenames and dimensions.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state, issues, feature requests, and deployment details for the EcoPowerHub AI frontend.
